channel.title: What would you like to make?
channel.description:
Hi,
Ok im making my own trimming for my server and when you use a hammer on a silver bar I want a "what would you like to make?" option in the chat box...
how would you do that? and also how would you get images to so its a bit like this... ___________________________________ | what would you like to make? | | <black silver trim image> | | Black Body (t) | | | |___________click for more...__________|
just with more on it?...
please help me,
thanks...
~ toonshorty

Hi,
